articles.author: MEHDI FATTAHI, JON GAMBRELL
articles.title: For many Iranians, Trump’s return intensifies worries about war. Yet some see reasons for hope - The Associated Press
articles.description: Iranians are divided on what Donald Trump’s next presidency will bring: Some foresee an all-out war between Tehran and Washington, particularly as other conflicts rage in the region. Others hold out hope that America’s 47th president might engage in unexpecte…
articles.content: TEHRAN, Iran (AP) Iranians, like many around the world, are divided on what Donald Trumps next presidency will bring: Some foresee an all-out war between Tehran and Washington, particularly as other … [+5905 chars]
